author: chinthaka
msg: Improving Strings handling. When u use buffers to improve String handling and if u use string concat inside them, then you are losing your objective.

author: chinthaka
msg: Perf improvements : Removing explicit calls to String constructor.

author: chinthaka
msg: Please do not use either new Boolean(true) or new Boolean(false). Please use Boolean.TRUE or Boolean.FALSE. Talking with performance hat on :)
